page.title: 08Youth clubs in Haltwhistle
page.content: There are a lot of clubs to join. The Cubs and Scouts meet weekly in the Scout Hut and Guides and Brownies in the Methodist Hall. The Methodist Youth Club is open three times a week and provides table tennis, snooker, pool,darts, in comfortable ,carpeted rooms for only 10p per week. In the Church Hall a Karate Club meets twice a week for those who enjoy a more strenuous activity. In the Youth Annexe attached to the Middle School a youth club meets with a choice of organised practice in gymnastics, football, trampolining, aerobic dancing, typewriting or drama. Young musicians can join the Haltwhistle Silver Band.
